mapper.select:
select
from jishuxieyi where xieyibianhao = #{xieyibianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 0,1

select count(*) from jishuxieyi where 1=1 and xieyibianhao like concat('%',#{xieyibianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and xieyimingcheng like concat('%',#{xieyimingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and xieyineirong like concat('%',#{xieyineirong,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and xieyijiafang like concat('%',#{xieyijiafang,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and xieyiyifang like concat('%',#{xieyiyifang,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and qianyueren like concat('%',#{qianyueren,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and qiandingriqi >= concat('',#{qiandingriqi1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and qiandingriqi <= concat('',#{qiandingriqi2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'')

select from jishuxieyi where 1=1
and xieyibianhao =#{xieyibianhao}

select from jishuxieyi where 1=1 and xieyibianhao like concat('%',#{xieyibianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and xieyimingcheng like concat('%',#{xieyimingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and xieyineirong like concat('%',#{xieyineirong,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and xieyijiafang like concat('%',#{xieyijiafang,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and xieyiyifang like concat('%',#{xieyiyifang,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and qianyueren like concat('%',#{qianyueren,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and qiandingriqi >= concat('',#{qiandingriqi1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and qiandingriqi <= concat('',#{qiandingriqi2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') order by id desc
limit #{pageno},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert:
insert into jishuxieyi
id,
xieyibianhao, xieyimingcheng, xieyineirong, xieyijiafang, xieyiyifang, qianyueren, qiandingriqi,
addtime,

#{addtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update jishuxieyi
xieyibianhao = #{xieyibianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xieyimingcheng = #{xieyimingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xieyineirong = #{xieyineirong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xieyijiafang = #{xieyijiafang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xieyiyifang = #{xieyiyifang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qianyueren = #{qianyueren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qiandingriqi = #{qiandingriqi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update jishuxieyi set xieyibianhao = #{xieyibianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},xieyimingcheng = #{xieyimingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},xieyineirong = #{xieyineirong,jdbcType=VARCHAR},xieyijiafang = #{xieyijiafang,jdbcType=VARCHAR},xieyiyifang = #{xieyiyifang,jdbcType=VARCHAR},qianyueren = #{qianyueren,jdbcType=VARCHAR},qiandingriqi = #{qiandingriqi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
